parameters.name: AnomalyId
parameters.description: The ID of the alert event. You can call [DescribeSuspEvents](~~DescribeSuspEvents~~) to obtain the alert event ID, with the value path being: data.SuspEvents[index].UniqueInfo.

parameters.name: AnomalyUuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the alert event asset. You can call [DescribeSuspEvents](~~DescribeSuspEvents~~) to obtain the asset UUID, with the value path being: data.SuspEvents[index].Uuid.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
Sets the language type for the request and response messages. The default is **zh**. Values:

- **zh**: Chinese
- **en**: English

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace of the graph, which is fixed as: hundun_dc_online.

parameters.name: VertexId
parameters.description: Vertex ID. This does not need to be proactively provided.
